Description: Rim and wall sherd of Milesian pottery plate or shallow dish; glaze fired mostly orange-brown. Top of rim glazed; interior slipped cream; from outside: band of dots; band with added colour, worn; metopal frieze of alternate red and black tongues and rosettes; band with added colour; leaf or bud circle in tondo; exterior: three bands near rim, two on mid-wall,
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.294)
